parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Map

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current scale of given map control.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlMapScale''' ctrl

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control = ([[findDisplay]] 12) [[displayCtrl]] 51; //Arma 3
_scale = [[ctrlMapScale]] _control; //returns number from 1 to 0.001</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlScale]], [[ctrlSetScale]]
</value></part></template>
